comments:
I often get a NPE while updating after having synchronized my workspace in Team Synchronize perspective. This is not systematic and the update is correct but sometimes I get an Error dialog saying that an error occured and here information I have looking in Problem view:

Note that I get this NPE not only while synchronizing.

Here's a test case to reproduce:
1) I have some new files in my workspace
2) In syncronize view, double-click on one of these new files
3) Enter some changes in compare editor
4) Close the compare editor without saving the changes
5) Answer no to Save Resource dialog asking if you want to save the changes
   => Got the Error dialog
   => Look at Error log and you'll see a similar NPE stack trace...
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 158791 ***
